name: The City of Sicily
description: Scorching sun beats down on a sapphire sea.White houses cling to a mountain's side, dwarfed by the snow-capped peak above. A solitary boat floats, a splash of color against the vast blue.

description: This painting showcases a Monarch butterfly in stunning detail.
